description: SLIMER PARALLEL extraction - instruction template w/ or w/o D&G
with_DeG:
Extract the entities of type {ne_tags} from the text chunk you have read. Be aware that not all of these entities are necessarily present. Ensure each entity is assigned to only one appropriate class.
To help you, here are dedicated Definition and Guidelines for each entity tag.
{Def_and_Guidelines}
Return only a JSON.
without_DeG:
Extract the entities of type {ne_tags} from the text chunk you have read. Be aware that not all of these entities are necessarily present. Ensure each entity is assigned to only one appropriate class.
